message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it's worth a significant amount, so I'm starting the negotiation at $19,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but $19,000 is significantly higher than I can go right now. Could you meet me halfway at $14,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to exceed $10,000 for the product. I would like to propose $12,000 as a compromise. I hope this meets your needs.
